statements: SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, disease FROM patients WHERE outcome='Recovered';
SELECT patient_name, age, disease FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender='Male' AND outcome='Died';
SELECT patient_name, disease FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender, disease, outcome FROM patients WHERE age > 40 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender, outcome FROM patients WHERE disease = 'Cancer' ORDER BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND disease IN ('Flu', 'COVID-19') ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, disease FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 50 AND outcome = 'Recovered' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender, outcome FROM patients WHERE disease LIKE '%Heart%' ORDER BY gender, age DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, dob, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT treatment_name, dosage FROM treatments WHERE dosage > 100;
SELECT patient_name, outcome FROM patients ORDER BY outcome DESC;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE diagnosis = 'Diabetes' ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patients.patient_name, treatments.treatment_name, treatments.dosage FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id WHERE treatments.treatment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, dob, outcome FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND dob < '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(treatment_id) AS treatment_count FROM treatments GROUP BY patient_id HAVING treatment_count > 3;
SELECT AVG(dosage) AS avg_dosage, treatment_name FROM treatments GROUP BY treatment_name ORDER BY avg_dosage DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_start_date, treatment_end_date FROM treatments WHERE treatment_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, outcome_date, outcome_description FROM outcomes WHERE outcome_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT * FROM treatments WHERE treatment_name LIKE '%chemo%' ORDER BY treatment_start_date DESC;
SELECT p.name, o.outcome_date, o.outcome_description FROM patients p JOIN outcomes o ON p.patient_id = o.patient_id;

SELECT p.name AS patient_name, t.treatment_name AS prescribed_treatment, o.outcome_description AS treatment_outcome FROM patients p JOIN treatments t ON p.patient_id = t.patient_id JOIN outcomes o ON p.patient_id = o.patient_id WHERE t.treatment_end_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, age FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%';
SELECT * FROM Treatments ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, condition FROM MedicalHistory WHERE diagnosis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' AND diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT AVG(result_value) FROM LabResults WHERE test_name = 'Blood Pressure';
SELECT Patients.name, LabResults.test_name FROM Patients JOIN LabResults ON Patients.patient_id = LabResults.patient_id WHERE result_value > 120;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM treatments WHERE cost < 100 ORDER BY cost ASC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors WHERE clinic_location LIKE '%Hospital%' ORDER BY doctor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT patient_name, disease_name, treatment_name FROM patients JOIN diseases ON patients.disease_id = diseases.disease_id JOIN treatments ON diseases.disease_id = treatments.treatment_id WHERE patients.age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;

SELECT patient_name, doctor_name, clinic_location, appointment_date FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id WHERE appointments.appointment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT doctor_name, COUNT(appointment_id) AS total_appointments FROM doctors JOIN appointments ON doctors.doctor_id = appointments.doctor_id GROUP BY doctor_name ORDER BY total_appointments DESC;
